amendment.description: To remove the staffing level limitation imposed on the Transportation Security Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 916 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 916 proposed by Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S7811; text: CR S7811) To remove the staffing level limitation imposed on the Transportation Security Administration.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 916 proposed by Senator Hollings.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 916 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
